user.title: Manual Configuration
user.description:
Enter your Boks credential.

**Preference Order:**
1. **Master Key (64 chars):** Full access.
2. **Config Key (8 chars):** Standard access.

delete_pin_code.description: Deletes a PIN code from the Boks. Requires Configuration Key.

identifier.name: Identifier

type.name: Type
type.description: The type of code to delete.

create_code.name: Create Code
create_code.description: Creates a new access code for your Boks.

device_id.name: Boks Device
device_id.description: The Boks device on which to create the code.

code.description: The 6-character PIN code (0-9, A, B). If omitted, a random code will be generated.
